name: Let'sCompute
0:
”Alexa open computer facts”
”Alexa ask computer facts for a fact”
”Alexa tell computer facts to tell me trivia”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: computer facts
des:
Ask for Computer Facts, and learn about what really matters, like technology.

Computer Facts provides fun the whole family can enjoy and is guaranteed to make you smarter.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Computer Facts" or "Alexa, open Computer Facts" to get a fact".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
